title: Some image links not working in boards?
body:
I'm trying to get a couple of images to display for a champion concept I'd like to showcase. Unfortunately, the images remain as links. I've tested extensively on throw--away boards that I deleted soon after. I tried reducing the image filesize or changing the hosting site, and it didn't do much. Is there any way to get images to show properly here?

http://i.imgur.com/JtJNNhZ.png
http://i.imgur.com/xmhQTef.png
http://i.imgur.com/vS0pl9m.png
http://i.imgur.com/ebtH0FJ.png

EDIT: Apparently they're working now...

replies.body: They usually don't auto populate in previews, but should after you make your post.  Also check out the [Boards Formatting 101](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/YHPBc6k3-board-formatting-101) post for some more comprehensive formatting methods!  Test complete.  :D

Thanks! I'm just used to showcasing in HTML, and I find this API a little limiting. That link will provide great help though!
 {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
